solution_line_template: So far, Jesse has read {chapter_1_pages} + {chapter_2_pages} + {chapter_3_pages} + {chapter_4_pages} + {chapter_5_pages} = <<{chapter_1_pages}+{chapter_2_pages}+{chapter_3_pages}+{chapter_4_pages}+{chapter_5_pages}={pages_read_so_far}>>{pages_read_so_far} pages.
That's 1/3 of the book, so the remainder of the book is twice as many pages, or {remaining_multiplier} * {pages_read_so_far} = {pages_still_to_read} pages.
